# Goliat Provider

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "Goliat" {
  backend_url = "http://localhost:4321"
  token       = "123"
}

resource "organization_resource" "example" {
  name = "New Provider Organization"
  type = "providerOrganizations"
}
